articles.title: Adani Bond Rebound Helps Erase Short Seller Hit: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A rally over the last week was powerful enough to erase some losses on a series of dollar bonds tied to the conglomerate of billionaire Gautam Adani, debt that had dropped after a short seller accused firms owned by him of fraud.
articles.content:
The jump came after Adani Group raised $1.4 billion for a renewables project (File)

articles.title: USFDA pulls up Intas Pharma for manufacturing lapses at Ahmedabad plant - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In a warning letter to the company's CEO and MD Nimish Chudgar, the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) has pointed out various manufacturing lapses at the  Matoda-Sanand, Ahmedabad-based facility.
articles.content:
The US health regulator has pulled up Intas Pharmaceuticals for manufacturing lapses, including violation of current good manufacturing practice (CGMP) regulation, at its Ahmedabad-based plant.
